item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

You’re wrong. Look at the rule in black.

[quote author=Tico135 link=topic=148203.msg1408621#msg1408621 date=1180676773]

[ul][center] Thanks to Mod Taharok for stickying this. [/center]

[center][size=15pt][color=navy]Rules of this board[/size][/center]

[list]
[li]No spamming. This means making useless polls, unnecessary posts, and posting in Capital letters. If you do this there is a 95% you will be ignored. Posting just a smiley is spam.[/li]
[li]No Flamming. This means no cursing or swearing at anyone. If they spam, do not flame them about spam. Instead, report it and leave it as is. The moderators will deal with it.[/li]
[li]Do not under any circumstances talk about “rep” in any way. It is against the MoparScape / Moparisthebest rules.[/li]
[li][color=red]Do not create “Help Threads” to help people as this is what the section is for.[/li]
[li]Before you post a question, I would request that you check these FAQ’s as well as the stickies, as this might answer your question.[/li]
[li]Do not ask for a tutorial. Look for it in the tutorials section.[/li]
[li]Do not post multiple threads about the same question.[/li]
[li]Do not “bump” or “double post” or thread to get people to read it. This is a big one. Most new people tend to do this a lot. It is highly annoying![/li]
[li]Do not ask if servers are online. Use the server advertisement section for a server as well as the server status page.[/li]
[li]Stay on-topic. Do not post something that has nothing to do with the question at hand.[/li]
[li]Do not post useless polls. Create a topic instead.[/li]
[li]Only questions pertaining to MoparScape should be in this section[/li]
[li]Do not post unless you have tried yourself first. If there isn’t anything you can try, then this doesn’t apply to you[/li]
[li]No more making threads like: Server Statuses, mod!!!, For Mod Taharok (or other mods). These tend to be pointless topics; you do not need a mod to always answer your questions! Other players do know the answers. Also, do not ask whether servers are up/down. You all should know the rules by now; no more of this.[/li]
[li]Grammer is a must. If you continue to use slang (u, r, etc.) the topic will be locked.[/li]
[li][color=red]From now on all topic titles must be short and precise. No more swearing in the titles, get to the point![/li]
[li]From now on criticizing another member’s work or opinion is against the rules. If someone has put time into something, don’t say “wtf is your problem? why did you make this?”. Also, there is no more critisizing opinion. Everyone is entitled to their own opinion, leave them be.[/li]
[/list][/ul]

Read full topic
